code:
def divisors(n)
  1.upto(Math.sqrt(n).to_i).select{|i| n.modulo(i).zero?}.map{|i| [i, n.div(i)].uniq}.flatten.sort
end

def eq(n)
  divisors(n.size)[0...-1].map{|w| w.step(n.size, w).map{|i| n[(i-w)...i].to_i}.minmax.inject(:-).abs}.min
end

def neq(n)
  min, max = 100, 0
  i = 0
  while i < n.size
    j = (n[i] == ?1) ? i+1 : i
    return 100 unless j < n.size
    min, max = [min, n[i..j].to_i].min, [max, n[i..j].to_i].max
    i = j+1
  end
  max - min
end

n = gets.chomp
p [eq(n), neq(n)].min

INF = 100

def divisors(n)
  1.upto(Math.sqrt(n).to_i).select{|i| n.modulo(i).zero?}
end

def eq(n)
  divisors(n.size).map{|w| w.step(n.size, w).map{|i| n[(i-w)...i].to_i}.minmax.inject(:-).abs}.min
end

def dfs(n, i, min, max)
  return max - min unless i < n.size

  j = (n[i] == ?1) ? i+1 : i
  return INF unless j < n.size

  t = n[i..j].to_i
  dfs(n, j+1, [min, t].min, [max, t].max)
end

def neq(n)
  dfs(n, 0, INF, 0)
end

n = gets.chomp
p [eq(n), neq(n)].min

N = gets.chomp

def ok(d)
  1.upto(N.size/2) do |i|
    min = max = N[0...i].to_i
    l = i
    while l < N.size
      ok = false
      [l+i-1, l+i, l+i+1].each do |r|
        next unless l < r
        next unless r <= N.size
        t = N[l...r].to_i   #
        next unless [max, t].max - [min, t].min <= d
        min = [min, t].min
        max = [max, t].max
        l = r
        ok = true
        break
      end
      break unless ok
    end
    return true if l == N.size
  end
  false
end

p (0..8).find{|i| ok(i)}

INF = 100

def divisors(n)
  1.upto(Math.sqrt(n).to_i).select{|i| n.modulo(i).zero?}.map{|i| [i, n.div(i)].uniq}.flatten.sort
end

def eq(n)
  divisors(n.size)[0...-1].map{|w| w.step(n.size, w).map{|i| n[(i-w)...i].to_i}.minmax.inject(:-).abs}.min
end

def dfs(n, i, min, max)
  return max - min unless i < n.size

  j = (n[i] == ?1) ? i+1 : i
  return INF unless j < n.size

  t = n[i..j].to_i
  dfs(n, j+1, [min, t].min, [max, t].max)
end

def neq(n)
  dfs(n, 0, INF, 0)
end

def divisors(n)
  1.upto(Math.sqrt(n).to_i).select{|i| n.modulo(i).zero?}.map{|i| [i, n.div(i)].uniq}.flatten
end

def eq(n)
  divisors(n.size).map{|w| w.step(n.size, w).map{|i| n[(i-w)...i].to_i}.minmax.inject(:-).abs}.min
end

def dfs(n, i, min, max)
  return max - min unless i < n.size

  j = (n[i] == ?1) ? i+1 : i
  return INF unless j < n.size

  t = n[i..j].to_i
  dfs(n, j+1, [min, t].min, [max, t].max)
end

def neq(n)
  dfs(n, 0, INF, 0)
end

n = gets.chomp
p [eq(n), neq(n)].min

n = input()
length = len(n)
ans = 10

#2桁,1桁混合
lst = []
ind = 0
while ind < length:
  if n[ind] == "1" and ind + 1 <= length - 1:
    lst.append(int(n[ind:ind + 2]))
    ind += 2
  else:
    lst.append(int(n[ind]))
    ind += 1
ans = min(ans, max(lst) - min(lst))

#n桁のみ
divisors = []
for i in range(1, length // 2 + 1):
  if length % i == 0:
    divisors.append(i)

for i in divisors:
  lst = []
  for j in range(0, length, i):
    lst.append(int(n[j:j + i]))
  ans = min(ans, max(lst) - min(lst))

print(ans)
